title: The Amazing Light Bulb
image_desc: A close-up image of a classic incandescent light bulb, glowing brightly against a dark background.
content: - Invented by Thomas Edison (though others contributed).
Enabled longer working hours and safer nighttime activities.
narration: Hello everyone! Today, we're talking about the light bulb – a seemingly simple invention that completely changed the world.  It was Thomas Edison who is most associated with it, although many people worked on the technology. Before the light bulb, people relied on candles, oil lamps, and gaslight – imagine how different life must have been! The light bulb allowed people to work and live later into the night, making a huge impact on society.  It's a truly amazing piece of technology.
